Text: Jafar Panahi locked up in one of the most horrible prisons in Iran,he is facing constant torture,he is in jail just for speaking against tyranny and oppressions committed by one of the most dangerous and backward regimes of our time.let's not to forget him by raising our voice & exposing mullah dictator Khamenei's crimes against humanity.
Cheers Mate! I've been looking for that one for a long time
